prompt: Retrieve the 100 most recent studies related to diabetes. Include the study's ID, official title, start date, completion date, and overall status.
query: s.nct_id, official_title, start_date, completion_date, overall_status FROM studies s JOIN conditions c ON s.nct_id = c.nct_id WHERE c.name ILIKE '%diabetes%' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 100;

prompt: Find all studies on the different kinds of B-NHL cancer that started on or after 2015. Return the study's condition, start and completion dates, and Boolean columns 'p1' through 'p4' indicating the study's phase.
query: SELECT c.name AS condition, s.start_date, s.completion_date, (s.phase ILIKE '%phase 1%') AS p1, (s.phase ILIKE '%phase 2%') AS p2, (s.phase ILIKE '%phase 3%') AS p2, (s.phase ILIKE '%phase 4%') AS p4 FROM studies s JOIN conditions c ON s.nct_id = c.nct_id WHERE (c.name ILIKE '%B Cell Lymphoma%' OR c.name ILIKE '%Follicular Lymphoma%' OR c.name ILIKE '%Small Cell Lymphocytic Leukemia%' OR c.name ILIKE '%Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia%' OR c.name ILIKE '%Burkitt Lymphoma%' OR c.name ILIKE '%Mucosa-Associated Lymphoid Tissue Lymphoma%' OR c.name ILIKE '%Mantle Cell Lymphoma%' OR c.name ILIKE '%Lymphoblastic Lymphoma%' OR c.name ILIKE '%Primary Mediastinal Large B-cell Lymphoma%') AND s.start_date >= '2015-01-01';
